name: Food Rescue
description:
Food Rescue is a top-view running game made for the #CoronaDefoldJam under the rules. Theme is "running out of power".

In Food Rescue you are Paul. Paul is the last human who can save and rescue all the food after the collaps: The global broken powergrid. No power anymore - the city ran out of power.

Now its on you! Run thru all the buildings and find the food before it is rotten! But be careful! The more you eat - the more fat you will become. You have to run around to waste kilocalories. Dont do this too much or you're also running out of power and starve!
